languages.text: {n}Пока остальные вид-скрины пестрят все новыми и новыми бегущими строками, экран перед вами моргает и сменяет статическое изображение. Паскаль слишком поглощен своим таинством, чтобы обратить на это внимание.{/n}
{n}While the other vid-screens are filled with more and more strings of symbols, the monitor in front of you blinks and its static image changes. Pasqal is too engrossed in his ritual to notice.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Пока остальные вид-скрины пестрят все новыми и новыми бегущими строками, экран перед вами моргает и сменяет статическое изображение. Паскаль слишком поглощен своим таинством, чтобы обратить на это внимание.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}While the other vid-screens are filled with more and more strings of symbols, the monitor in front of you blinks and its static image changes. Pasqal is too engrossed in his ritual to notice.{/n}
{n}While the other vid-screens are filled with more and more strings of symbols, the monitor in front of you blinks and its static image changes. Pasqal is too engrossed in his ritual to notice.{/n}
{n}While the other vid-screens are filled with more and more strings of symbols, the monitor in front of you blinks and its static image changes. Pasqal is too engrossed in his ritual to notice.{/n}
{n}While the other vid-screens are filled with more and more strings of symbols, the monitor in front of you blinks and its static image changes. Pasqal is too engrossed in his ritual to notice.{/n}

languages.text: {n}其他的视讯屏幕上浮现出了越来越多的符号串，但你面前的视讯屏幕却在闪烁着，上面的静态图像也在发生变化。帕斯卡全神贯注地忙着他的仪式，没有留意到这点。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}While the other vid-screens are filled with more and more strings of symbols, the monitor in front of you blinks and its static image changes. Pasqal is too engrossed in his ritual to notice.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}其他的视讯屏幕上浮现出了越来越多的符号串，但你面前的视讯屏幕却在闪烁着，上面的静态图像也在发生变化。帕斯卡全神贯注地忙着他的仪式，没有留意到这点。{/n}

languages.text: {n}他のスクリーンが次々と記号の羅列で埋め尽くされる中、目の前のモニターは点滅して静止画が変化する。パスカルは儀式に没頭しているため気づかないようだ。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}While the other vid-screens are filled with more and more strings of symbols, the monitor in front of you blinks and its static image changes. Pasqal is too engrossed in his ritual to notice.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}他のスクリーンがどんどん記号の羅列で埋め尽くされる中、目の前のモニターは点滅して静止画が変化する。パスカルは儀式に没頭しているため気づかないようだ。{/n}
{n}他のスクリーンが次々と記号の羅列で埋め尽くされる中、目の前のモニターは点滅して静止画が変化する。パスカルは儀式に没頭しているため気づかないようだ。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Während sich die anderen Vid-Bildschirme mit immer mehr Symbolreihen füllen, blinkt der Monitor vor dir, und sein statisches Bild verändert sich. Pasqal ist zu sehr in sein Ritual vertieft, um es zu bemerken.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}While the other vid-screens are filled with more and more strings of symbols, the monitor in front of you blinks and its static image changes. Pasqal is too engrossed in his ritual to notice.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Während sich die anderen Vid-Bildschirme mit immer mehr Symbolreihen füllen, blinkt der Monitor vor dir, und sein statisches Bild verändert sich. Pasqal ist zu sehr in sein Ritual vertieft, um es zu bemerken.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Alors que les autres écrans affichent toujours un flot incessant de symboles, le moniteur en face de vous clignote, et son image statique se modifie. Pasqal est trop absorbé par son rituel pour s'en apercevoir.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}While the other vid-screens are filled with more and more strings of symbols, the monitor in front of you blinks and its static image changes. Pasqal is too engrossed in his ritual to notice.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Alors que les autres écrans affichent toujours un flot incessant de symboles, le moniteur en face de vous clignote, et son image statique se modifie. Pasqal est trop absorbé par son rituel pour s'en apercevoir.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Mientras las demás videopantallas se llenan con cada vez más líneas de símbolos, el monitor que hay frente a ti parpadea y su imagen estática cambia. Pasqal está demasiado centrado en su ritual como para darse cuenta.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}While the other vid-screens are filled with more and more strings of symbols, the monitor in front of you blinks and its static image changes. Pasqal is too engrossed in his ritual to notice.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Mientras las demás videopantallas se llenan con cada vez más líneas de símbolos, el monitor que hay frente a ti parpadea y su imagen estática cambia. Pasqal está demasiado centrado en su ritual como para darse cuenta.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Diğer video ekranları giderek daha fazla sembol dizileriyle dolarken, önündeki monitörün ışığı yanıp sönüyor ve üzerindeki statik görüntü değişiyor. Pasqal, bu değişimi fark edemeyecek kadar ayinine kendisini kaptırmış durumda.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}While the other vid-screens are filled with more and more strings of symbols, the monitor in front of you blinks and its static image changes. Pasqal is too engrossed in his ritual to notice.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Diğer video ekranları giderek daha fazla sembol dizileriyle dolarken, önündeki monitörün ışığı yanıp sönüyor ve üzerindeki statik görüntü değişiyor. Pasqal bu değişimi fark edemeyecek kadar ayinine kendini kaptırmış durumda.{/n}
